permission.denied.title: Music access permission required
permission.denied.message: DearMusic needs permission to read audio files on your device in order to display and play your music collection.
permission.permanentlyDenied.title: Access permission blocked
permission.permanentlyDenied.message: The permission to read audio files is blocked in Settings. Open the app settings and enable the permission so DearMusic can load your music collection.
permission.snackbar.needAllow: Please allow audio permission in Settings
empty.songs.message: No new songs to display yet.
settings.title: Settings
settings.skipIntro.title: Skip silent
settings.skipIntro.subtitle: Jump straight to the music without the silence
settings.smartOutro.title: Smart outro crossfade
settings.smartOutro.subtitle: Smooth transition when a song is about to end
settings.replayGain.title: ReplayGain
settings.replayGain.subtitle: Normalize volume across songs
settings.theme.title: Theme
settings.recap.title: View your DearRecap
settings.recap.subtitle: Your music listening stats this year
settings.clearPins.title: Remove all Pins
settings.clearPins.subtitle: Clear pinned albums/songs/artists
settings.clearPins.confirmMessage: This will delete all pinned songs, albums, and artists. This action cannot be undone.
settings.resetRecs.title: Reset recommendations
settings.resetRecs.subtitle: Clear playback statistics
settings.battery.title: Battery: Unrestricted
settings.battery.subtitle: Keep playback running in the background
settings.quickAccess.title: Show Quick Access
settings.quickAccess.subtitle: Recommendation & history section on the main page
settings.scanAll.title: Scan all folders
settings.scanAll.subtitle: If disabled, only selected folders will be scanned
settings.folders.title: Scanned folders
wrapped.missingData.artist: Not enough artist data to generate your story.
wrapped.missingData.album: Not enough album data to generate your story.
wrapped.missingData.general: Not enough data to generate your story.
wrapped.slide.intro.title: #DearRecap Music Story {year}
wrapped.slide.intro.subtitle: The soundtrack of your life.
wrapped.slide.song.title: Your #1 Song
wrapped.slide.song.subtitle: Your Essential Soundtracks
wrapped.slide.artist.title: Your #1 Artist
wrapped.slide.artist.listTitle: Other artists that caught your ear:
wrapped.slide.album.title: Your #1 Album
wrapped.slide.daily.title: Your Daily Ritual
wrapped.slide.daily.subtitle: You listened the most during {time}.
wrapped.slide.weekly.title: Your Weekly Pattern
wrapped.slide.weekly.subtitle: {insight}
wrapped.slide.discovery.title: Explorer Spirit
wrapped.slide.discovery.subtitle: new songs discovered this year.
wrapped.slide.loyalty.title: Listener Type
wrapped.slide.loyalty.subtitle: Completion Rate
wrapped.slide.outro.title: See You Next Year
wrapped.slide.outro.subtitle: Keep creating your story with #DearMusic.
wrapped.errorSlide.title: Keep listening and come back next year!
wrapped.insight.topSong.high100: This one stayed with you through a lot. Over {count} plays, and still not enough.
wrapped.insight.topSong.high50: Over {count} plays. Something about this track keeps pulling you back.
wrapped.insight.topSong.default: {count} plays is not an accident. This song matches your rhythm.
wrapped.insight.discovery.high100: {count} new songs. Your ears are always hungry for something fresh.
wrapped.insight.discovery.high20: {count} new songs found their way into your days. Your curiosity keeps your map wide.
wrapped.insight.discovery.default: {count} new songs made it into your playlist. Slow, but still growing.
wrapped.insight.completion.loyal: You're loyal. You let {pct}% of your songs play all the way through. That's rare.
wrapped.insight.completion.balance: {pct}% finished. You know when to stay and when to move on. Balanced.
wrapped.insight.completion.explorer: {pct}% finished. You explore a lot and chase what hits the most.
wrapped.personaInsight.mystery: Your taste is unique and hard to predict.
wrapped.personaInsight.pop: You know what's trending and you stay updated with the latest releases.
wrapped.personaInsight.rock: You run on energy. You want distortion, impact, punch.
wrapped.personaInsight.jazz: You actually listen. Every detail and harmony matters to you.
wrapped.personaInsight.folk: You look for calm and for stories in the lyrics. Music is where you slow down.
wrapped.personaInsight.indie: You don't mind digging for new sounds and finding hidden gems.
wrapped.personaInsight.eclectic: Your taste is wide. You enjoy almost everything.
wrapped.weeklyInsight.none: Every day is a music day.
wrapped.weeklyInsight.weekend: Your favorite day is {day}. Perfect time to relax and just listen.
wrapped.weeklyInsight.weekday: Your favorite day is {day}. Music gets you through the grind.
settings.language.title: Language
settings.language.subtitle: Choose app language
settings.resetRecs.confirmMessage: This will erase your current music suggestions and relearn from zero. This cannot be undone. Continue?

autoplay.title: Smart Autoplay
autoplay.subtitle: When your album or queue ends, DearMusic can automatically play songs that match your listening habits. Turn off to stop after the last track.

batteryDialog.title: Allow Background Activity
batteryDialog.content: Set battery mode to "Unrestricted". This is required to keep music playing when the screen is locked or when you switch to another app.
